description: This file provides a utility function for determining the winner in a Tic Tac Toe game. It analyzes a 3x3 board array to identify if there is a winning line for either player.

methods.name: calculateWinner(squares)
methods.description: Computes the winner of the Tic Tac Toe game based on the current board state. Returns an object with the winner ('X' or 'O') and the winning line indices, or null if there is no winner yet.
